parameters.query:
-- Leads que completaron cuestionario hace 3 d√≠as y no han pagado
SELECT 
  id,
  email,
  nombre,
  nivel_actual,
  perfil_inicial,
  created_at
FROM programa_users
WHERE estado = 'lead'
  AND created_at::date = (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '3 days')::date
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM programa_users pu2 
    WHERE pu2.email = programa_users.email 
    AND pu2.estado = 'activo'
  )
ORDER BY created_at;

-- Leads que completaron cuestionario hace 7 d√≠as y no han pagado

  perfil_inicial,

  AND NOT EXISTS (

  )
ORDER BY created_at;
